code: import{userLogin,userRegister,userSetGoal,getUserGoalData,getMyInfo,getUserGoals,createNewPost,getAllPosts,updateLikePost}from"./apiCalls";import{setAuthHeadersAfterLogin}from"./base";import{saveAuthDataToDevice}from"./storage";import{toast}from"react-toastify";export var login=function login(params,navigate,setIsLoggedIn){userLogin(params).then(function(response){setAuthHeadersAfterLogin(response.headers,response.data.token);saveAuthDataToDevice(response.headers,response.data.token);setIsLoggedIn(true);toast.success("User Logged In Successfully");navigate("/dashboard");}).catch(function(error){toast.error(error.message);});};export var register=function register(params){console.log(params);return userRegister(params);};export var setGoal=function setGoal(params,navigate){userSetGoal(params).then(function(response){navigate("/dashboard");toast.success("Goal Added Successfully");}).catch(function(error){toast.error("Someting went wrong");});};export var getGoalData=function getGoalData(){return getUserGoalData();};export var getUserInfo=function getUserInfo(){return getMyInfo();};export var getUsersAllGoals=function getUsersAllGoals(){return getUserGoals();};export var setNewPost=function setNewPost(params){createNewPost(params).then(function(response){console.log(response);toast.success("Post created succesfully");}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);toast.error("Something went wrong");});};export var getAllPostsList=function getAllPostsList(){return getAllPosts();};export var likePost=function likePost(){updateLikePost().then(function(response){console.log(response);toast.success("Post liked");}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);toast.error("something went wrong");});};
